18#ifndef _LVM_PV_MAP_H
19#define _LVM_PV_MAP_H
20
21#include "metadata.h"
22
23/*
24 * The in core rep. only stores a mapping from
25 * logical extents to physical extents against an
26 * lv. Sometimes, when allocating a new lv for
27 * instance, it is useful to have the inverse
28 * mapping available.
29 */
30
31struct pv_area {
32 struct pv_map *map;
33 uint32_t start;
34 uint32_t count;
35
36 struct dm_list list; /* pv_map.areas */
37};
38
39struct pv_map {
40 struct physical_volume *pv;
41 struct dm_list areas; /* struct pv_areas */
42 uint32_t pe_count; /* Total number of PEs */
43
44 struct dm_list list;
45};
46
47/*
48 * Find intersection between available_pvs and free space in VG
49 */
50struct dm_list *create_pv_maps(struct dm_pool *mem, struct volume_group *vg,
51 struct dm_list *allocatable_pvs);
52
53void consume_pv_area(struct pv_area *area, uint32_t to_go);
54
55uint32_t pv_maps_size(struct dm_list *pvms);
56
57#endif
58
